name: Volatility-Volume Cycle Reversion – Large-Cap Mean Reversion
description: Daily-bar, long-only mean-reversion system for highly-liquid U.S. large-cap equities. It buys after sharp volatility/volume wash-outs that push 14-day RSI below 30 and exits when the bounce normalises (RSI > 50) or a 3 % gain is reached, with a hard 2 % stop. Position risk is capped at 1 % of equity per trade.
